overview: Babymetal Live: Legend 1999 & 1997 Apocalypse is the second live video release by Babymetal. It contains two concerts consisting of "Legend "1999" Yuimetal & Moametal Seitansai" held at NHK Hall on June 30th 2013 and "Legend "1997" Su-metal Seitansai" held at Makuhari Messe Event Hall on December 21st 2013.
title: BABYMETAL - Live Legend 1997 Su-metal Seitansai
